# The `NfaTranscriber` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

The internal class that maintains all possible paths through an NFA based on a path through the DFA. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

## Description {#details}

The internal class that maintains all possible paths through an NFA based on a path through the DFA.

## Private Member Attributes

### Allocator {#a03a6b6347fc32650c23afb87f90ff36b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>SpecificBumpPtrAllocator&lt;PathSegment&gt; llvm::internal::NfaTranscriber::Allocator</>}>
We allocate segment objects frequently.

Allocate them upfront and dispose at the end of a traversal rather than hammering the system allocator.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/automaton-h/#l00074">74</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/automaton-h">Automaton.h</a>.

### TransitionInfo {#ae910acd0f2641531f00efb92be8b01cc}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>ArrayRef&lt;NfaStatePair&gt; llvm::internal::NfaTranscriber::TransitionInfo</>}>
Cached transition table.

This is a table of NfaStatePairs that contains zero-terminated sequences pointed to by DFA transitions.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/automaton-h/#l00062">62</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/automaton-h">Automaton.h</a>.
